info.name: Food Ordering Microservices API
info.description: Comprehensive API documentation for the food ordering microservices system with Kafka integration. This collection includes endpoints across 5 microservices: Order, Payment, Notification, Delivery, and Restaurant services.

item.name: 1. Order Service (5001)
item.description: Order management microservice - handles order creation, retrieval, and status updates

request.description: Creates a new food order. This triggers the order flow: payment processing, kitchen preparation, and delivery assignment.
Retrieves detailed information about a specific order by its ID.

query.description: Filter by order status (pending, confirmed, preparing, ready, delivered)

request.description: Retrieves all orders with optional filtering by status, userId, or restaurantId.
Retrieves order statistics including total orders, status breakdown, and revenue metrics.
Health check endpoint to verify the service is running and get basic service information.

item.name: 2. Payment Service (5002)
item.description: Payment processing microservice - handles manual payment processing with idempotent operations and retry capability

request.description: Manually processes a payment for an order. This endpoint is idempotent - calling it multiple times with the same orderId will return the existing payment record instead of creating duplicates. Supports different payment methods with varying success rates and processing delays. This is now a manual operation that must be called after order creation.
Retrieves payment information for a specific order ID.

query.description: Filter by payment status (pending, processing, success, failed)

request.description: Retrieves all payments with optional filtering by status and payment method.
Retrieves payment statistics including success rates, method breakdown, and revenue metrics.
Retrieves available payment methods with their success rates and processing delays.
Health check endpoint to verify the service is running and get basic service information.

item.name: 3. Notification Service (5003)
item.description: Notification microservice - listens to all Kafka events and generates user notifications

request.description: Retrieves all notifications (simulated; no persistence) with optional filtering by userId, type, and priority.
Retrieves detailed information about a specific notification by its ID.
Marks a specific notification as read.
Marks all notifications for a specific user as read.
Retrieves notification statistics including total counts, read/unread breakdown, and type distribution.

item.name: 4. Delivery Service (5004)
item.description: Delivery management microservice - handles manual driver assignment, pickup, and delivery tracking

request.description: Manually assigns a delivery driver to an order. This is now a manual operation that requires specifying the driver ID and delivery address.
Manually marks a delivery as picked up by the driver. This confirms the driver has collected the food from the restaurant.
Manually marks a delivery as completed. This confirms the food has been delivered to the customer.
Retrieves delivery information for a specific order ID.

query.description: Filter by delivery status (assigned, in_progress, completed)

request.description: Retrieves all deliveries with optional filtering by status and driver ID.
Retrieves all delivery drivers with optional filtering by availability.
Retrieves delivery statistics including completion rates, average delivery times, and driver performance metrics.
Health check endpoint to verify the service is running and get basic service information.
